DocAttribute.Name: RelatingProcess
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the Process, that is the predecessor.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedProcess
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the Process, that is the successor.

DocAttribute.Name: TimeLag
DocAttribute.Documentation: Time Duration of the sequence, it is the time lag between the predecessor and the successor as specified by the SequenceType.

DocAttribute.Name: SequenceType
DocAttribute.Documentation: The way in which the time lag applies to the sequence.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The RelatingProcess shall not point to the same instance as the RelatedProcess.
